title: THE_MAN_WHO_SKIED_DOWN_EVEREST.avi
description: A revelation in the power of sports documentary, THE MAN WHO SKIED DOWN EVEREST garnered the coveted Academy Award for Best Documentary in 1975. The film follows world champion skier Yuichiro Miura and his inteprid team of adventurers as they overcome frostbite, icefalls, illness, and even death to ascend and then descend Mount Everest. Beautifully and bravely shot, the documentary tells a story that is riveting every step of the way, with a climax that is surely one of the tensest in cinematic history.
